pkgmetadata.longdescription: Goofys is a high-performance, POSIX-ish Amazon S3 file system written in Go. It allows you to mount an S3 bucket as a file system, prioritizing performance over strict POSIX compliance. Goofys supports multiple cloud storage backends including Amazon S3, Google Cloud Storage, Azure Blob Storage, and S3-compatible services like Ceph and MinIO. It provides better performance than s3fs while being easier to configure than complex caching solutions
